name: AGLAEMap
short_description:
The proper way to quote AGLAEMap is:
Development of a multi-detector and a systematic imaging system on the AGLAE external beam
L. Pichon, B. Moignard, Q. Lemasson, C. Pacheco, Ph. Walter,Nuclear Instruments and Methods in Physics Research Section B: Beam Interactions with Materials and Atoms, Volume 318, Part A, 1 January 2014, Pages 27-31

Due to the copyright transfer to the publisher, the online availability of the article will depend on your subscription to ScienceDirect. 
The article doi is http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.nimb.2013.06.065
The abstract should be available in any case.
 

This software read Esrf Data Format (EDF) files

It has been developed to handle on a large number of detectors and series of maps. Its
 interface allows to easily pass from a detector to another and from an analysis to another. Elemental mapping is achieved by selecting a region of interest in the spectra and the corresponding picture can be saved.
